title: Hawk and Chick vs Cephalopod Monster
description: Hawk and Chick fight the Cephalopod Monster! Director’s cut of the film features lost footage of Itsuki Sugimoto.
altHero: a giant cephalopod monster in a village
alt1: mid-haircut, Chick raises her sword to run after the monster
alt2: Hawk and Chick fight the cephalopod monster
